hlfOptions.hlfOptions_Instructions: Use this config file to adjust the functionality of this app. Each option has individual instructions with it.
hlfOptions.ProxyOutputDirectory_Instructions: This is the directory that final proxies will end up in. Defaults to 'proxies' in the same folder as the exe if invalid or left blank.
hlfOptions.ScryfallPath_Instructions: This is the path to a Scryfall JSON file. Defaults to 'scryfall' in the same folder as the exe if invalid or left blank.
hlfOptions.ProximityDirectory_Instructions: This is the directory containing the files Proximity needs to run. Defaults to the same folder as the exe if invalid or left blank.
hlfOptions.IsTraceEnabled_Instructions: Enables more detailed trace logs. Not needed for most users.
hlfOptions.DeleteBadFaces_Instructions: Goes through the proxies created by Proximity and deletes the half that are unusable, then collects the new ones in the output directory.
hlfOptions.UpdatesOnly_Instructions: Checks for existing proxies in the output directory, and only processes new cards.
hlfOptions.RetryCount_Instructions: How many retries the program will do for cards that fail to render properly in Proximity.
hlfOptions.RetryCount_Instructions_2: Defaults to 3, which should be more than enough for small batch sizes.
hlfOptions.BatchSize_Instructions: How many cards to put in one batch. Smaller batch sizes will work better for slower computers. Defaults to 40.
hlfOptions.BatchSize_Instructions_2: This value must stay even in order for proxies to be deleted and renamed properly. It will be corrected to even if it's not already.
hlfOptions.ArtFileExtension_Instructions: The extension for the art crop files supplied to Proximity. NOT the extension for generated proxies, those will be '.png' files.
hlfOptions.ArtFileExtension_Instructions_2: Defaults to '.jpg' if invalid or left blank.
hlfOptions.ProxyRarityOverride_Instructions: If you want all of the proxies to share a rarity, assign that here. Defaults to using Scryfall data if invalid or left blank.
hlfOptions.UseCardSubset_Instructions: Only generate cards listed in 'CardSubset' option.
hlfOptions.CardSubset_Instructions: Add cards to this list and enable 'UseCardSubset' if you only want to generate a specific set of cards rather than the whole format.
hlfOptions.IllegalSetCodes_Instructions: Sets to filter out from the legal cards. Useful for Un cards and certain promos. Don't change unless you know what you're doing.'
hlfOptions.ManualArtistOverrides_Instructions: List cards here that need artists manually assigned.
hlfOptions.ManualArtistOverrides_Instructions_2: This will mostly be the back side of adventure cards, as well as any card with two arists credited for the same piece.

ManualArtistOverrides.card: Faerie Guidemother // Gift of the Fae
Queen of Ice // Rage of Winter
Shepherd of the Flock // Usher to Safety
